data.title: Military and sexist discrimination
data.text:
REFUSED ACTIVE DUTY MILITARY because they weren't California residents.  Don't get me wrong, this is a crap establishment to begin with but to refuse legal state ID's and military ID's is completely ridiculous. In addition to the refusal, they discriminated based on sex.  They allowed me (a female) to enter with a Florida ID but not my husband or friend who are both active duty Marine Corps with a military ID as well as out of state ID's.

This was also all done by a guy who insisted he was an active duty staff sergeant in the Marine Corps. Way to serve your brothers big guy...I'm glad you work for an establishment that discriminates.  I've posted pictures of the ABC liquor laws as well as the gentlemen who allowed my entry but refused my husband.

An update: a note was just sent to me saying we were denied service because we caused a scene. That is completely false. I was allowed in and my husband was denied entry at the door based on his ID before saying a word to anyone.

You can also see more reviews here and on TripAdvisor stating military discrimination.

data.title: Best bar in town!
data.text: This place is like family! You walk in and know everyone! Strong  and cheap drinks you just cant go wrong!! Love the bartenders! Awesome jukebox and on tues you get FREE tacos with a purchase of a drink

data.title: Won't serve those with out of state licenses
data.text: I went to Ole's and the security at the door wouldnt let me in because i have an Arizona license. He said that they dont trust Marines that arent local to California. Newsflash, just because a military member doesnt have the local state ID doesnt mean they arent stationed at the local base. We dont have to change our licenses every time we move to a new duty station. And if one or two Marines were bad customers, just kick them out, dont punish everyone else. If a black guy was a bad customer would you not serve all black customers. And lets not forget that the military fights for your freedom to even own a business. Thanks for the support you unpatriotic jerks.

data.title: Fun bar in downtown San Clemente
data.text: Cool place on El Camino, little tiny and it can fill up quickly on the weekend. Prices are pretty reasonable, bartenders are friendly enough. Nice place to grab a drink but a little crowded on the weekends.

data.title: Great dive bar in San Clemente
data.text: Nice little dive bar with some pool tables in the back.  gets pretty packed sometimes and bouncers will give you hard time with out a Cali ID.  Definitely more a locals spot but everyone was cool.

data.title: peanuts and value drinks
data.text: Liked this place.  Had a seat at the bar in front of a video game.. Nice strong well drinks and inexpensive (cheap) beer specials.  It wasn't crowded yet so we had great service.  Maybe always great service but can't comment on that.

data.title: its a bar
data.text: Plain and simple - a local joint with local color. Cold beer, loud music and fun with friends! I am sure that they pack in the crowds on a sports night.

data.title: Great Time!
data.text:
We were part of wedding that was gorgeous but just ended too soon. We wanted to keep the party going but it was a Sunday night. Someone suggested Ole's and the place had a fair aount of people in it. Dressed to the 9's we walked in and instead of getting crazy looks for wearing pearls in a local bar we were greeted by Mike at the door. The bar tender was especially nice and her name escapes me because well, we got a little too many drinks from her. He had blonde hair, young and was super sweet. There was even left over pizza that we gladly ate. 

I only write this because we had terrible service at our hotel and the staff at Ole's made our night much better and we didn't want to leave to back to our horrible accommodations. 

Mikey looked out for us young girls and kept the drunken men at bay. We would love to visit again in proper attire and have another drink with Mike. 

The decor was cool and was clean. Granted, in this bar you throw the peanut shells and things on the floor which we realized is part of the culture (we're from Huntington Beach, every other bar is like that there) but besides that, everything was really clean and had nice pool tables and jukebox.

data.title: Good Place
data.text: Its a lot better than the expensive bars on Del Mar. The staff is very friendly and quick, While we were there at least.

data.title: Get drunk, fall down, puke. Good times!
data.text: Get drunk, fall down, puke. Good times!

data.title: It's a locals joint.  There's not much to it.  It's your basic bar hole with your familiar faces.  It's not a far walk...
data.text: It's a locals joint.  There's not much to it.  It's your basic bar hole with your familiar faces.  It's not a far walk from the beach either.  Wet your whistle and the your feet!

data.title: Muy buen lugar y ambiente
data.text: Excelente lugar para ver partidos con amigos con muy buen ambiente y varios LED y disfrutar de diferentes deportes! Muy buenas cervezas y compañía! Fui a ver el partidos de chile en el mundial y estábamos casi solos un poco después del medio día!
